intro: Klotzschiphytum, commonly known as the silver sword, is a striking plant native to the Canary Islands. It belongs to the Asparagaceae family and is characterized by its rosette of thick, fleshy, silver-blue leaves. The plant produces tall, branched flowering stems that bear small, white or pale blue flowers. It is adapted to arid environments, storing water in its leaves and stems. Due to its unique appearance and hardiness, it is a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
